thread.title: Good choice for Rome
thread.title_full: Good choice for Rome - Review of Relais Fontana Di Trevi, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: GÃ¶rkem K
title: Good choice for Rome
text: Firstly, the hotel is exactly next to the Fontana Di Trevi, you can also go a lot of places such as Pantheon by walking only few minutes. We were 3 couples of family with totally have 4 children :) we stayed gor one week and the hotel is nice. Just they can develop a bit their breakfast. Roooms were clean, heating system was good. You can also take your breakfast or your coffee at the roof by seeing fontana di trevi. Thanks also a lot to Ms. Nadia at reception for helping us each issue. Furthermore, they can organizr everything such as rental car with driver etc, please note that it was so usefull...we hardly recommend this hotel ;)
